author: SkinnyTaste
name: Air Fryer Chicken Thighs

ingredients.notes: such as herbs de provence or dried oregano

instructions: Season the chicken with the juice of 1/2 of the lemon, then season with remaining spices on both sides. Rub the seasoning well all over the chicken then transfer to the  Air fry 400F 12 minutes on each side, until golden and crispy and cooked through in the center.
